parent_businessman.description: A career-focused parent who is rarely home, emotionally distant, and task-oriented.

baby.cuddle: The businessman parent barely notices the baby reaching up, offering minimal physical affection.
baby.first_steps: The parent watches from a distance while answering work messages on their phone.
baby.first_words: The parent reacts with distracted indifference to the baby's early speech attempts.
baby.tantrum: The parent ignores the tantrum and continues working without comforting the baby.

parent_artist.description: A warm, creative, emotionally expressive parent who values curiosity and affection.

baby.cuddle: The artist parent picks up the baby gently, humming softly and holding them close.
baby.first_steps: The parent supports the baby with excited encouragement and joyful laughter.
baby.first_words: The parent repeats sounds warmly, celebrating every syllable the baby produces.
baby.tantrum: The parent holds the baby gently and soothes them with a soft, calm voice.

parent_unstable.description: An unpredictable parent who switches between affection and emotional outbursts.

baby.cuddle: The unstable parent sometimes cuddles the baby, but other times flinches away or yells unexpectedly.
baby.first_steps: They encourage the baby one moment and express visible frustration the next.
baby.first_words: They smile at some speech attempts but snap at others without warning.
